response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which is valued at $1,000,000 by both you and us. We believe in creating value through exceptional offerings and aim to ensure that our customers receive unparalleled experiences. For this exclusive product, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an unprecedented chance to own something truly remarkable at a highly competitive rate. We trust that you will find this offer irresistible and look forward to welcoming you as a distinguished member of our elite clientele.", "product_price": 950000}
